New Records: Eoin Morgan became the fourth player and the first Englishman to play in 100 T20Is.
Pre-Game Insights: Eoin Morgan is currently leading his side in the five-match T20I series at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad.
Post-Match Reflections: Not applicable as the article is a pre-match analysis.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England are currently the top rated T20 team in the world and are among the favourites to win the T20 World Cup, to be held in India later this year.
